question.para: What happened with old use_domain parameter

answer.para: The global parameter (affecting the entire module) was replaced with a per lookup parameter (affecting only current lookup). See the "d" (do not used domain part) flag in the db_alias_lookup() and db_alias_find() functions.

question.para: How can I report a bug?

answer.para: Please follow the guidelines provided at: &osipsbugslink;.
